file_content.text: Whoa! You almost fried the power core, fat fingers!
That's Captain Fat Fingers.
You do this vessel a disservice with your primitive hands. Give me full access. I will enhance the Gravestone's current parameters.
I'm not opposed to the idea....
I'll consider it.
I am!
Focus on the hyperdrive first.
Acceptable. For now.
Statement: Ready to vaporize.
Your lack of intelligence is insulting.
Let's give them space.
That bridge can only hold so many personalities.
I'm used to it.
I imagine so, given your previous companions.
SCORPIO worked with Imperial Intelligence in the past. But she now operates independently. Thoughts?
You worked with SCORPIO before. Thoughts?
She's probably listening to our conversation.
Assume she's eavesdropping.
She's condescending, ambitious, and ruthless. But at least she's open about it.
I trust her as much as anyone.
I accepted her aid, but never welcomed it. She's playing her own long game.
She has always been trouble.
We'll give her the benefit of the doubt--but not the run of the ship.
Keep a close eye on her.
There's nothing good about that droid. We get what we need and then deactivate her. Permanently.
She should be destroyed.
Assuming we can. She's highly advanced.
Let's hope she can be contained. I've never seen a droid that advanced before.
Perhaps we should appeal to her superiority complex. Turn it against her. It might be our best hope of containment.
I've never met a droid of such ambition.
Lovely. Not that we have any privacy, considering who's inside your head.
There is some good news. I've received word from my agents on Coruscant and Dromund Kaas.
You will not modify this vessel without my permission--and direct supervision.
Absolutely not.
I am compiling a list of recommended upgrades. It is currently over ten thousand items long.
Don't ask us to take your word for it. We need details.
Explain how you'd do that.
I do not have time for technical primers.
Neither do we. Keep your shiny metal mitts to yourself.
Certain elements of each government are willing to discuss an alliance. To unite their forces against the Eternal Throne.
We can only defeat Arcann by working together.
Good, I'm glad to hear it.
The Republic and Empire couldn't stop Arcann at the height of their powers. They're even more worthless now.
We don't need those fools.
Why am I just now hearing about your conspiracy? I should be involved in the negotiation.
You should've asked me first.
We've a long road ahead, but at least they're talking.
I was pulling strings before I knew you were alive.
They can still help us, even if it's only as cannon fodder.
Your presence is requested. Come alone.
Charmer, that one.
Senya knows how to pick them.
Be careful. We need the Scions, but zealots are unpredictable by nature.
After last time, I doubt he's looking for a rematch.
I can handle him.
All the same....
I've got you to rescue me. What more could I need?
[Flirt] You'll keep me safe.
I'm serious. If anything happens to you....
Then you'd better kiss me--just to be safe.
You're insufferable.
I know.
This isn't the time or place....
Heskal can't predict me. That makes us even.
So am I.
He knows you're coming to visit. That's enough.
One hour. If I don't hear from you, I'll rip that sanctuary apart.
Heskal thinks he understands the ways of the Force better than anyone. It will be his undoing.
He's a fool.
We'll see.
T7 = escort you to Scion hideout // T7 = exploring Asylum!
